chapter.title: Scope
chapter.para:
JBoss Tools related functionality should be tested first.
Seam
Hibernate
TBD: list JBossTools Modules

Third-party bundled software listed below should go through integration testing:
Test NG
Spring IDE

All guides related to JBoss Tools must be reviewed against released JBossTools version:
Seam Reference Guide
JSF and Struts
Hibernate
JBoss AS adapter

That is not test team responsibility to test bundled third party software listed below:
Web Tools
Team Plugin for SVN support
But if an issue suspected to be third-party related it must be reported twice: in JBIDE JIRA project and in third-party bug tracking system. JBIDE JIRA issue must contain link to related issue in third-party bug tracking system.
